message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $11,500.  It's a great deal and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we meet somewhere in between?
Bob, I understand your position. While I value your interest, I'm still a bit higher than $10,000. How about we split the difference and go with $10,500? This would be a great deal for both of us.
